text: Natsume did some great stuff on the NES, including this beast song, but I wish they did a bit better with stories. If memory serves, this story, as shown in the game, is that you punch this one dude at the beginning. Okay. Fight! lol Still better than Super Mario Bros. and stuff, I guess.

author: figment1988

text:
I heard of this through some obscure book claiming to be an official Nintendo cheat guide. Had SNES, NES, and Game Boy games with mini strategy guides to each of the games(helped me get through Battletoads as a kid).
Had a bunch of animals surfing on ice on the cover. Not sure if anyone's ever seen it or not, I'm pretty sure it was home made and distributed, but can't be certain since I found it at a garage sale.
